title: High FPS Low Ping but still packet loss
body:
Hi i have windows 8.1 i run league at a capped 60fps (cause 60hz monitor) and when there's not problem i have about 33 ping which is really good.

My problem though is in maybe 10-25% of my games at some point i will get packet loss, this is what i experience:
- complete loss of control but animations are still playing as if everything was fine (except i have no control over my champ etc)
- my ping doesnt peak it stays relatively low it peaks to maybe 40-60ms but that is still good ping it should make me lose control for several seconds.
-rarely when its happening a bunch of times in a short time frame the ping will show 400-2000+

i have done traceroute and ping in command prompt and once the request hops a few times within riots addresses i start getting a request timed out.
so i can't really see where the loss is happening but before it reaches riots first address i have 0 loss and very low ping.

other ppl seem to have the same problem in game which leads me to think its on riot's side but what can i do in windows 8.1 to make sure nothing is making this connection difficult? services or something maybe? some setttings in network adapters that would disable something useless that causes problems or something?

replies.body:
I confirmed that there haven't been any recent NA Service Issues that would cause packet loss for you from our end. Most of the time, packet loss is either caused by local network settings that conflict with League or a routing issue before your connection hits our servers. Before we take a closer look at your route with a detailed traceroute, I recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local settings are fine.

Let me know if this caused any change.
